title: Analects of War
text: The Analects of War is an ancient military treatise written by [[Karrn the Conqueror]], the founder of the pre-[[Galifar]] nation of [[Karrnath]]. It has been the most influencial text on Karrnathi military strategy and tactics for the last three millennia, and seminars on the treatise are taught every semester at [[Rekkenmark Academy]] to this day. In addition to military thinking, it has influenced business tactics, legal strategy, lifestyles, and more across [[Galifar]].
